metadata.job: Analyze revenue trends, R&D investments, and market positioning strategies

extracted_sections.section_title: Display the details of employees whose salary is between 1000 and 3000.
SQL> select * from emp where sal between 1000 and 2000;
Display the employee names and yearly salary with the header “Annual Salary”.
7. Display the list of employees whose names start with ‘S’ and contain exactly 5 characters.
SQL> select ename from emp where deptno=20 and sal>3000;
Find all clerks who earn between 1000 and 2000.
SQL> select * from emp where job='CLERK' and sal between 1000 and 2000;
12. List department no and name in alphabetical order of department name.
13. List the details of the employees in department 10 and 20 in alphabetical order of name.
14. Display name and total remuneration of all employees.
